title: South Africa's omicron coronavirus outbreak subsides as fast as it grew
content:
1. South Africa's omicron coronavirus outbreak subsides as fast as it grew  The Washington Post
  2. Omicron Severity New Study Shows Hospitalization Rate 80% Lower Than Delta  Bloomberg
  3. Case drop may show South Africa's omicron peak has passed  Associated Press
  4. Some glimmers of hope are emerging on omicron, but experts stress caution  CNBC
  5. S.African study offers Omicron hope as nations reimpose curbs  Reuters
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
